attributes.action: Limit the data included in the Electronic Staff Record Project of the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Computer records are inherently prone to error, misuse and tampering. The data of the Electronic Staff Record Project will be available nationally and internationally to a large number of people, including the staff of multinational corporations. 
   Sensitive personal details about the health, absence record, and contact details of NHS staff should not be included in the database being created in the ESRP.
